about_the_game:
STORY


Immerse yourself in Alvara, a forgotten land at the heart of the Vat, the infinite universe. This RPG with mechanics inspired by the classics of the genre offers an innovative narrative experience and an immersive system of choices. Every decision you make will shape Alvara's destiny and influence her story.

Forge your own adventure in this rich, captivating world, where every choice has real, tangible consequences. Explore varied environments, meet fascinating characters and make crucial decisions that will determine Alvara's fate.

You are Zoltae, an orphaned warrior from Bazzya. Your tormented past and uncertain future plunge you into an epic quest where every choice will determine the fate of Alvara, the lost land. Will you save Alvara from the darkness that threatens it, or doom its inhabitants to a bleak future?

Discover how your past and future are intimately linked to the history of Alvara, and influence the world in which you live.

Choose

Make your own choices, where each decision will have irreversible consequences for Alvara and its inhabitants. Write a unique story where your quest for truth and justice may well lead to the destruction of everything you love.

Recruit

Meet colorful characters with unique motivations and personalities. Convince them to join you and form a formidable team to face the dangers of Alvara. Take advantage of their skills and strength to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way.

Fight

Master tactical turn-based combat where strategy is your ultimate weapon. The unique Synergy system lets you unleash devastating attacks if your allies trust you, but will leave you exhausted afterwards.
Make crucial choices: will you fight alongside the most powerful warriors who despise you, or will you prefer the cunning thief who faithfully follows you? Each ally has its strengths and weaknesses, so exploit them wisely to triumph.

Exploration

Explore the vast expanses of Alvara, especially the continent of Occilargia. Wander through richly varied landscapes and discover ancient ruins that hold the secrets of the past. Understand the history of the world and your place in it. But will you be ready to accept the truth, even if it challenges everything you believe?

FEATURES

  • Combat: Immerse yourself in battles offering an immersive or strategic experience, with the option of choosing your angle of view.
  • Menu: Enjoy an ergonomic menu that lets you navigate freely between the map, equipment and your missions.
  • Interaction: Interact with hundreds of objects, explore the world, harvest its riches and discover its secrets.
  • Dungeons: Put your wits to the test by solving puzzles to understand the world and find your way.
  • Exploration: Enjoy an immersive camera that moves closer when you walk and farther when you run, for a better gameplay experience.
  • Quests and Merchanting: Take part in quests and vary prices according to your relationship with merchants, adding a social dimension to your transactions.
  • Blacksmithing and alchemy: Master the art of crafting and alchemy to forge or craft anything you desire.
  • Exploration: Discover interactive maps and, if you find them, use them to travel quickly to the places you've discovered.
  • Unique events: Unique events linked to the calendar will be present throughout Alvara, to create a more dynamic gameplay that will have a direct impact on it.
  • Skills: Develop your character and those of your team, with your skill points.

    About Early Access:
    Currently, early access allows you to explore Alvara up to the Bazzya Road (end). After that, although the game is fully playable, updates have not yet been implemented. However, you should know that they are weekly, and that embarking on the Alvara adventure will keep you captivated for many hours!

content_descriptors.notes: Presence of blood and animals/creatures that may frighten the youngest
